sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO estimate ( unq , email , name , phone , person , money , ptime , floc , sdate , edate , schange , airline , stay , stayname , req , rdate , inestimateagree , title , userid , city , passage ) VALUES ( SEQ_estimate_unq.nextval , '$email$' , '$name$' , '$phone$' , '$person$' , '$money$' , '$ptime$' , '$floc$' , '$sdate$' , '$edate$' , '$schange$' , '$airline$' , '$stay$' , '$stayname$' , '$req$' , sysdate , '$inestimateagree$' , '$title$' , '$userid$' , '$city$' , '$passage$' )
